name: Mirror Rift
description:
Global Game Jam South Africa Entry

A former scientist gets sucked into a portal and is forced to fight for his survival. With several environments with their very own challenges and duality, this may be the end of his own life.

3rd-year VEGA students

  • Michael S. Engelbrecht
  • Simon Pascal Baumann

Pre-alpha phase, patches and updates to be released soon!
